com.aston.group.stationdefender.actors

Class Unit

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.aston.group.stationdefender.actors.Unit
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Actor
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Alien, Weapon

    public abstract class Unit
extends java.lang.Object
implements Actor
    Abstract superclass inherited by Weapon and Alien subclasses.

        Parameters:

        speed - The speed of the Unit
        damage - The damage the Unit inflicts
        rateOfFire - The rate of fire of the Unit
        health - The health of the Unit
        range - The range of the Unit
        x - The X co-ordinate of the Unit
        y - The Y co-ordinate of the Unit
        width - The width of the Unit
        height - The height of the Unit
